snippet: Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky on Friday accused President Obama, his campaign and his administration of engaging in tactics similar to those of the Nixon White House.
abstract: Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky on Friday accused President Obama, his campaign and his administration of engaging in tactics similar to those of the Nixon White House.

headline.main: McConnell Accuses Obama and Aides of Schemes to Curtail Free Speech
headline.print_headline: McConnell Accuses Obama Administration Of Schemes to Muzzle Opponents’ Speech
